website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Max Thea Mid is a shoe to pick up when looking for a very comfortable and warm-keeping shoe. It has a durable and lightweight construction with a sleek and stylish design. Women on-the-go will love it for its easy on and off feature. Made of premium materials, the pair comes at an expensive price.
pros: The Nike Air Max Thea Mid does an excellent job of keeping the feet warm, according to a handful of buyers
Most buyers who tried the shoe on have said that it runs true to size
The majority of the Nike Air Max Thea Mid owners feel comfortable when they wear the shoes
Some like the shoe for its stylish look, especially as it enhanced the silhouette of the original Air Max Thea
The visible Air unit in the heel gives excellent cushioning
Durability is offered by the Nike Air Max Thea Mid’s rubber waffle outsole
The elastic gore makes it easy for the shoe to be put on and off
Several users have found the model to be lightweight
The shoe’s premium materials not only give it a more luxurious appeal but a longer-lasting performance as well
cons: Some consider this shoe to be quite expensive
Although the shoe is lighter than past releases in the Air Max Thea series, some have noted that it still feels a bit heavier than they expect

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these shoes on a server and then scoured the internet for them. I am normally a solid 10, but they only had an 11 in stock. I just went for it thinking I could wear thick socks. I'm glad i went with the larger size, as these definitely run a bit on the smaller side. They are a bit snug in the toe box, but nothing bad. I can't overstate enough how comfortable these are. I have worn them nonstop for 2 weeks, on my feet all day and walking around , without any pain or soreness whatsoever. And I get compliments every time I wear them. Style up or down, these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V. Weber

customer_reviews.title: The best Nikes
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! They are so comfortable, light weight, and stylish. I have a really high arch, so anything that is a slip on can be really hard to put and and wear. Because of the high instep it can also be really hard to wear after time as it puts pressure on the top of my foot cutting off circulation. These however, I have zero problems with this and are so amazing comfortable. The color is beautiful while being neutral. I wear them all the time and have quickly become my go to shoe. I collect Nike’s and these might be my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: These boots ROCK!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are sooooo awesome!! People stalk me to find out where they can get these, just like I stalked someone out in the airport myself to find out how to get a pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan T. Massey

customer_reviews.title: What you see is what you get!! I love them
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!! The color is awesome. I wear them everywhere as you can see.🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Must haves!
customer_reviews.text: I saw my sister wear these and I had to order a pair immediately- thanks to amazon I got them the next day haha. These are amazing in every way- the style, the comfort, I’m obsessed with everything about these. I would say they run true to Nike’s sizing which I usually size up a half size in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nike Thea
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is true to size. I ordered a half size up because Nike usually runs small for me. They are too big, so order your true size. They are very comfortable otherwise. Also the color is darker than expected, they are more of a carmel color.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fun shoes/boots
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, a little tight at first. After a day of wear they loosened up though. Really love them, be careful around water/snow though! Make sure you use a waterproof protection first
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: My wife looks like a clown wearing them. She thinks she is hip and down with the kids. I personally think she looks like a dog with Shoes on... not in looks, but actions. Like “how do I walk in these”
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I was skeptical at first because i wear adidas since they are more comfy. These are amazing! They were tight at first but after wearing them a second time they loosened up just enough. I have knee issues and these work great for my knees. I get compliments ALL the time, perfect for fall outfits!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Marinho

customer_reviews.title: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Worth every penny! Every time I wear these, I get so many compliments! They are super comfortable and fit tts. My feet usually kill after a day at Disneyland. When I wore these, I had no complaints. My feet felt great. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eryn Burchard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very well made
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Extremely comfortable for my wife feet. I usually do not do well with Nikes in general. I have worn in rain and although I always get nervous that the leather will stain, no marks at all. I receive compliments all of the time and have now in 2 colors.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but one of them came with weird lines running down them. Damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received exactly what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was scratched on right side. The box that the shoes were shipped in was far too big for the shoe size. Not what I expected from my usual Nike boxes this was beat up and abnormal in size. If I didn’t know any better I would say they were knock offs (replicas) I didn’t want to chance returning and not getting a pair at all as the NIke stores are and continue to be sold out. The shoes fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Elvert Celestine

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit me a bit snug but I’ve ended up liking it!(not usual for me) I have terrible back pain and I know it’s because I have crap feet and I didn’t realize it till the end of the day but I have no back ache or foot ache! It’s also a plus that these shoes are DARLING!! They go with everything, clean up nicely, and always get compliments! They are a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Morgan m

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable with the sneaker sole!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and I would purchase these in other colors. I would say these run true to size but since I wear thicker socks, I would buy half a size up in the future.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coles

customer_reviews.title: Not cute
customer_reviews.text: These look like rubber boots and fit/look like them too. They are not the ones you get from Nordstrom!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! High quality Nike shoe! So comply! Get compliments every time I wear them!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: My new everyday shoe
customer_reviews.text: I would size up a half size! Normally I’m a 6 but in these I needed a 6.5 because there is no stretch like with the tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Luna-Llanes

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish hit lots of compliments!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sneaker, I will order it again if it comes in black too. The fit is true to size , very comfy to wear all day and it supports my back that after my injury is the most important. Ordered won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Sporty, HOT!
customer_reviews.text: The leather on the shoe is that of a quality dress shoe, with a sleek detailed design for the refined sporty look. It's just so unique, it kept calling my name. So glad they had my size & I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Air Max get them!
customer_reviews.text: First time with Air Max. I love them. The leather is perfect. Not too soft, not to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: these are so comfortable stylish and trendy. perfect for Fall days. I wear size 8 in shoes and got an 8 for thick socks and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Justask

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Box was banged up and the shoes had several scratches definitively not keeping that. Very tight on the toes so size up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tlm

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am kind of bummed that the shoes came kind of scuffed and marked! Other then that they are really pretty
customer_reviews.author: Matt Scherer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy casual Nike shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love how comfortable they are. I get so many compliments on these shoes. My bday gift to me turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had been on the search for these boots. They are just as great in person as they are in the picture!! Love them, true to size. I can't stop wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L. Spree

customer_reviews.title: Goes with everything
customer_reviews.text: Felt the design lack a bit of ummppff but still rockable
customer_reviews.author: Xiomi

customer_reviews.title: Get em!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! They feel like Nikes, but easy on and off and they look SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow, but they're GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I went up a half size - they run true to size but are narrow and I have a wider foot. They're GORGEOUS, I will wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and get compliments all the time. I’m normally a size 8 and I wear the 7 1/2 in these shoes
customer_reviews.author: K. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I get a ton of compliments every time I wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Scratch on shoe :(
customer_reviews.text: So sad, I waited forever for these, and paid for them at a much higher price. They have a scratch on them! I will be returning, or hoping to hear from seller on other options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfy and easy to slide on and off. I have gotten tons of compliments from everyone who has seen them.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Marks on Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe but disappointed that I paid as much as I did for a shoe that has marks on it as if it is not new.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan Denny

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes- great quality and very cute and sporty! They are really supportive and very comfortable. I ordered a size 7 (my usual size) and the fit was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Halls

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very cute and comfortable. I have narrow feet and they were a little snug when I first put then on, but they loosened up same day.
customer_reviews.author: CalliC

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Wear them daily, I couldn’t believe how light they are!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and versatile shoe you will own.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable and versatile shoe I own. They look fabulous with jeans, leggings, and skirts. I get numerous compliments every time I wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Grandinetti

customer_reviews.title: Really like them! Fit true to
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy! Really like them! Fit true to size
customer_reviews.author: Gwen B.

customer_reviews.title: True to size fit
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof them and they’re good for all seasons. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shoe, had a scuff mark on the toe on one of the shoes, but look and feel great. (I bought this for a girlfriend)
customer_reviews.author: Jershon V

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Just what I was hoping for. Fit great and super cute. Shipping was good as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift and she loves them. She says they fit great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: megan wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves them, says most comfortable shoes she's ever worn!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I spent 2 years looking and saving for these. Perfect fit. I love love them
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Ramahlo

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the look of these shoes but after trying them ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of these shoes but after trying them on the style is not as expected. The color is better in person but the style is not cute whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Perez

product_meta.title: Nike Women's W Air Max Thea Mid Trainers
product_meta.description: The modern Nike air max thea mid women's shoe comes equipped with updated design details for cold-weather comfort.
